entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 1:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16 except minus 6 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
